titleStmt.title: The vniversall medicine: or The vertues of the antimoniall cup Collected out of the experiments, and observations of the most famous, learned, and best approved philosophers, and physicians, that have written of that subject. By Iohn Evans minister, and preacher of Gods Word.
titleStmt.author: Evans, John, minister of Gods word.

titleStmt.title: The vniversall medicine: or The vertues of the antimoniall cup Collected out of the experiments, and observations of the most famous, learned, and best approved philosophers, and physicians, that have written of that subject. By Iohn Evans minister, and preacher of Gods Word.
titleStmt.author: Evans, John, minister of Gods word.

notesStmt.note: British Library copies have folding leaf, in 2 settings, beginning: "to the right honourable .. Nobility and Gentrie". They mention the book and have advertisement where Evans makes and sells the cups.--Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
